original_text: Enoch became the father of Irad. Irad became the father of Mehujael. Mehujael became the father of Methushael. Methushael became the father of Lamech.
korean_text: 에녹이 이랏을 낳고 이랏은 므후야엘을 낳고 므후야엘은 므드사엘을 낳고 므드사엘은 라멕을 낳았더라

sentences.original_text: Enoch became the father of Irad.
Irad became the father of Mehujael.
Mehujael became the father of Methushael.
Methushael became the father of Lamech.
